water infrastructure. bikes. despair. send help

Professionally: Information Technology. Operational Technology, Industrial Control Systems (ICS) and Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition (SCADA). I know some stuff about rockwell PLCs and the applications connected to them. I know some stuff about how fresh water gets to your house, and how the poops escape. Accidentally; infosec, OT security, incident response, emergency management.

Personally: read the toots.

i live on Payómkowishum land. What does it mean to acknowledge this? Where are the Payómkowishum? Is a relationship with them possible?

if i interact with you, its because i find you or what you post interesting, and want to be your friend. sometimes jokes dont land, or nuance is lost. we all deserve as much grace as can be given- at least until we are revealed to be monsters.
